edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.GameState
      • edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityMapping, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestingGround

    public abstract class Level
extends GameState
implements EntityMapping
    Level is a GameState that deals with game entities and actually game logic, making it it's own class. Every Level should have a GameMode (not yet implemented) which will constantly check whether the level is completed and should end. Every level has:
    • Tilemap
    • BoardEntity Manager which is in charge of updating and drawing the entities on the board.
    • LevelInputProcessor which processes touch events to detect gestures (such as swipe and tap)
    Author:
    Benji
